bug.author: reidswanson
bug.summary: UI doesn't show full model if backprop is set to false
bug.description: When pretraining is set to false (e.g., in the example for <denchmark-link:https://deeplearning4j.org/stackeddenoisingautoencoder.html>stacked denoising autoencoders</denchmark-link> ) the full model is not visible in the UI. Only the individual layers, except the output, are included.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AlexDBlack>@AlexDBlack</denchmark-link> do you know anything about this issue? Is it still relevant?
By design. UI has different sessions for layerwise pretraining vs. backprop. During pretraining, only the currently trained layer should be present in the corresponding session.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
